item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Billie Eilish - HIT ME HARD AND SOFT (2024) [HIGHRESAUDIO HRA 24bits/44.1kHz]
item.description:
Album info
Album-Release:
2024

HRA-Release:
17.05.2024

Label: Darkroom/Interscope Records

Genre: Pop

Subgenre: Pop Rock

Artist: Billie Eilish

Album including Album cover


"HIT ME HARD AND SOFT". Album of Billie Eilish buy or stream.


Tracklist:
01 SKINNY
02 LUNCH
03 CHIHIRO
04 BIRDS OF A FEATHER
05 WILDFLOWER
06 THE GREATEST
07 L’AMOUR DE MA VIE
08 THE DINER
09 BITTERSUITE
10 BLUE



Info for HIT ME HARD AND SOFT


Billie Eilish’s third studio album, "HIT ME HARD AND SOFT", released via Darkroom/Interscope Records is her most daring body of work to date, a diverse yet cohesive collection of songs— ideally listened to in its entirety from beginning to end—does exactly as the album title suggests; hits you hard and soft both lyrically and sonically, while bending genres and defying trends along the way. With the help of her brother and sole collaborator, FINNEAS, the pair wrote, recorded, and produced the album together in their hometown of Los Angeles. This album comes on the heels of her two massively successful albums “WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP WHERE DO WE GO?" and "Happier Than Ever" and works to further develop the world of Billie Eilish.

"While many pop musicians make good music, very few of them deliver interesting and surprising songs - Billie Eilish is one of them. "HIT ME HARD HIT ME SOFT" is a total work of art that shows that pop music can still be exciting, quirky and at the same time popular in 2024. A great album from one of the most versatile artists of our time." (starzone.ch)

Billie Eilish



1 disc(s) - 10 track(s)
Total length: 00:43:45
